publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3326# Mr Jamie Stone: Affordable Housing in the Highlands—That the Parliament is concerned that the lack of affordable housing in the Highlands undermines economic development in the area and threatens the future of many Highland communities.

S2M-3326# Mr Jamie Stone: Affordable Housing in the Highlands—That the Parliament is concerned that the lack of affordable housing in the Highlands undermines economic development in the area and threatens the future of many Highland communities.
S2M-3326# Affordable Housing in the Highlands (lodged on 21 September 2005) Donald Gorrie*
